resource.template: <#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_column_def(COL_ID_,NAME_,KEY_,IS_DEFAULT_,TEMPLET_,SET_TING_,IS_PUBLIC_,TYPE_,ICON_,IS_MOBILE_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if COL_ID_??>'${COL_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_DEFAULT_??>'${IS_DEFAULT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TEMPLET_??>'${ TEMPLET_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SET_TING_??>'${ SET_TING_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_PUBLIC_??>'${IS_PUBLIC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_??>'${ICON_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_MOBILE_??>'${IS_MOBILE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_column_temp(ID_,NAME_,KEY_,TEMPLET_,IS_SYS_,STATUS_,TEMP_TYPE_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TEMPLET_??>'${ TEMPLET_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_SYS_??>'${IS_SYS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if STATUS_??>'${STATUS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TEMP_TYPE_??>'${TEMP_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_msg_def(MSG_ID_,COLOR_,URL_,ICON_,CONTENT_,DS_NAME_,DS_ALIAS_,SQL_FUNC_,TYPE_,COUNT_TYPE_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if MSG_ID_??>'${MSG_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if COLOR_??>'${COLOR_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if URL_??>'${URL_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_??>'${ICON_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CONTENT_??>'${CONTENT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DS_NAME_??>'${DS_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DS_ALIAS_??>'${DS_ALIAS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SQL_FUNC_??>'${SQL_FUNC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if COUNT_TYPE_??>'${COUNT_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_msgbox_box_def(ID_,SN_,MSG_ID_,BOX_ID_,APP_ID_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if MSG_ID_??>'${MSG_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if BOX_ID_??>'${BOX_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_msgbox_def(BOX_ID_,KEY_,NAME_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if BOX_ID_??>'${BOX_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_portal_def(PORT_ID_,NAME_,KEY_,IS_DEFAULT_,LAYOUT_HTML_,PRIORITY_,IS_MOBILE_,LAYOUT_JSON_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if PORT_ID_??>'${PORT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_DEFAULT_??>'${IS_DEFAULT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if LAYOUT_HTML_??>'${ LAYOUT_HTML_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PRIORITY_??>${ PRIORITY_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_MOBILE_??>'${IS_MOBILE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if LAYOUT_JSON_??>'${ LAYOUT_JSON_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_remind_def(ID_,SUBJECT_,URL_,TYPE_,SETTING_,DESCRIPTION_,SN_,ENABLED_,ICON_,DS_NAME_,DS_ALIAS_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,CREATE_DEP_ID_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SUBJECT_??>'${SUBJECT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if URL_??>'${URL_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SETTING_??>'${ SETTING_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCRIPTION_??>'${DESCRIPTION_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if ENABLED_??>'${ENABLED_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_??>'${ICON_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DS_NAME_??>'${DS_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DS_ALIAS_??>'${DS_ALIAS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_portal_permission(ID_,LAYOUT_ID_,TYPE_,OWNER_ID_,OWNER_NAME_,MENU_TYPE_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if LAYOUT_ID_??>'${LAYOUT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if OWNER_ID_??>'${OWNER_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if OWNER_NAME_??>'${OWNER_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MENU_TYPE_??>'${MENU_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);
